explains: n. 一队；民防团；地方武装团队
n. （Posse）人名；（法）波斯；（瑞典）波瑟；（西）波塞
wordGroup: in posse [拉丁语]可能存在的(地)；可能的(地)；潜在的(地) , 可能地

sentences.en: The result was her own personal "cancer posse": a rock concert tour manager, a model, a fashion magazine editor, a cartoonist and MTV celebrity, to name a few.
sentences.cn: 结果她组成了自己的“癌症反击队”：一名摇滚音乐会巡演经理、一名模特、一位时尚杂志编辑、一位漫画家和 MTV 名人等等。

sentences.en: A posse of tough competitors is waiting for them.
sentences.cn: 一批强有力的竞争者在等着他们。

sentences.en: She formed a “posse” with other young women with cancer.
sentences.cn: 她同患有癌症的妇女们成立了一个“群社”。
